text: "Skyfall" is a song by Adele. It was used in a James Bond movie Skyfall. The tone is dark and melancholy. It received the Best Original Song award at the 70th Golden Globes and 85th Academy Awards. The song hit #1 on some music charts across the world. It reached the top ten in the United Kingdom (UK), United States (US) and Canada. ==Release== The song was released at 0:07 British Summer Time (BST) on October 5, 2012, while the song's MV on YouTube on October 18, 2012. As of January 22, 2025, it has accumulated 691,338,363 views. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2012–2013) Peak position Brazil (Billboard Brasil Hot 100) 25 Brazil Billboard Brasil Hot Pop Songs 3 Greece Digital Songs (Billboard) 1 Iceland (RÚV) 2 Italy (Federation of the Italian Music Industry) 1 Japan (Japan Hot 100) 20 Lebanon (Lebanese Top 20) 1 Luxembourg Digital Songs (Billboard) 1 Mexico (Asociación Mexicana de Productores de Fonogramas y Videogramas) 21 Norway (VG-lista) 7 Portugal Digital Songs (Billboard) 2 South Korea Digital Chart (Gaon Digital Chart) 69 South Korea (Gaon International Chart) 1 Chart (2021–2024) Peak position Billboard Global Excl.
